channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: As Oklahoma reels from deadly wildfires, authorities warn of fresh fire threat
item.description: With Oklahomans still reeling from deadly wildfires that whipped across the state and destroyed hundreds of homes in recent days, officials in Oklahoma, Texas and New Mexico are warning of an increased risk of fire danger on Tuesday.

item.title: A highway pileup in western Kansas shows how dust storms can turn deadly
US immigration flights set off terrified international searches for missing loved ones
